title: Abigail's Choice
description: When an unprecedented opportunity comes her way at work, Abigail Ross takes a risk that draws her right into the world of her gorgeous enigmatic billionaire boss James Harrison and hot charismatic business associate Alexander Duncan. Powerful, dominant and controlling, they are firm friends and both used to getting exactly what they want.Thrown by her intense sexual reactions to the man with the fearsome reputation who signs her pay checks, and intrigued by exactly what Alexander sees in her that he wants to explore, Abigail soon realises that itâ€™s not only the bright lights of the City seducing her. With an invitation to a special kind of private club that promises her sexual awakening and enlightenment, Abigail has a choice to make.From London to Las Vegas she finds her career, her heart and friendships on the line as her decision leads her on the most intoxicating sexual and emotional journey of her life
author: L.J. Dee
